text: My Best Pals () is a 1989 French comedy film directed by Jean-Marie Poiré. == Cast == * Gérard Lanvin - Richard Chappoteaux * Christian Clavier - Jean- Michel Thuillier * Jean-Pierre Bacri - Eric Guidolini (Guido) * Philippe Khorsand - Antoine Jobert * Louise Portal - Bernadette Legranbois * Jean- Pierre Darroussin - Daniel Pécoud (Dany) * Marie-Anne Chazel - Anne * Élisabeth Margoni - Monique ==References== == External links == * Category:1989 comedy films Category:French comedy films Category:French films
title: My Best Pals
